name: Cycles (Lander-Miskolczi)
description:
Your a just a simple Bike, going on his daily cycle of life, cycling around the outskirts of the city. Oh what a wonderful cycle he is having. Lets hope it stays that way.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to control

This is for the Extra Credits 2019 GAMEJAM Hope you enjoy!

Music was Found at: http://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Chiptune/

SoundEffects (SFX): Was created by me
